subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Russia took a 2-0 lead over Poland in the first round of a Fed Cup World Group match as Maria Sharapova and Svetlana Kuznetsova defeated the Radwanska sisters, Urszula and Agnieszka, in singles in Krakow, Poland.
snippet: Russia took a 2-0 lead over Poland in the first round of a Fed Cup World Group match as Maria Sharapova and Svetlana Kuznetsova defeated the Radwanska sisters, Urszula and Agnieszka, in singles in Krakow, Poland.
